snippet: A conservative former Parliament speaker ended his presidential campaign on Monday, narrowing the field of contestants to seven.
abstract: Gholam Ali Haddad Adel, conservative former Parliament speaker in Iran, ends his presidential campaign; departure narrows field of contestants in move that appears aimed at strengthening candidacies of fellow conservatives and reducing any chance that a moderate could win.
lead_paragraph: A conservative former Parliament speaker ended his presidential campaign on Monday, narrowing the field of contestants to seven.

headline.main: Iran: Candidate Drops Out of Presidential Campaign
headline.print_headline: Iran: Candidate Drops Out of Presidential Campaign
